movie.title: Look Who's Talking
movie.description_intro: Double-crossed, the lovelorn and very pregnant New York City accountant, Mollie, gets into James' cab and rushes to the hospital to give birth, after a failed attempt at love with a sleazy and self-centred businessman. Suddenly, Mollie is a single working mum--and what is even more disheartening--she has to embark on the nearly impossible quest to unearth the ideal father for her outspoken boy, Mikey. Could the perfect father be James, Mikey's favourite babysitter?
movie.description_full: Double-crossed, the lovelorn and very pregnant New York City accountant, Mollie, gets into James' cab and rushes to the hospital to give birth, after a failed attempt at love with a sleazy and self-centred businessman. Suddenly, Mollie is a single working mum--and what is even more disheartening--she has to embark on the nearly impossible quest to unearth the ideal father for her outspoken boy, Mikey. Could the perfect father be James, Mikey's favourite babysitter?

movies.title: Death Proof
movies.summary: In Austin, Texas, the girlfriends Julia, Arlene and Shanna meet in a bar to drink, smoke and make out with their boyfriends before traveling alone to Lake LBJ to spend the weekend together. They meet the former Hollywood stuntman Mike, who takes Pam out in his "death-proof" stunt car. Fourteen months later, Mike turns up in Lebanon, Tennessee and chase Abernathy, Zoë and Kim, but these girls are tough and decide to pay-back the attack.

movies.title: The Pact
movies.summary: When Monica finds out her daughter is about to die she takes extreme measures to save her.
movies.description_full: When Monica finds out her daughter is about to die she takes extreme measures to save her.

movies.title: The Twins
movies.summary: A mystery melodrama which deals with the bizarre incidents that unfold in a mountain cabinet.
movies.description_full: A mystery melodrama which deals with the bizarre incidents that unfold in a mountain cabinet.
movies.synopsis: A mystery melodrama which deals with the bizarre incidents that unfold in a mountain cabinet.

movies.title: Ice Age
movies.summary: Back when the Earth was being overrun by glaciers, and animals were scurrying to save themselves from the upcoming Ice Age, a sloth named Sid, a woolly mammoth named Manny, and a saber-toothed tiger named Diego are forced to become unlikely heroes. The three reluctantly come together when they have to return a human child to its father while braving the deadly elements of the impending Ice Age.

The three reluctantly come together when they have to return a human child to its father while braving the deadly elements of the impending Ice Age.
